Trade/Device Name(s): Sysmex UF-5000 Fully Automated Urine Particle Analyzer
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Sysmex UF-5000 Fully Automated Urine Particle Analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sysmex UF-5000 Fully Automated Urine Particle Analyzer, an in vitro diagnostic instrument for quantitative and flagged analysis of urine formed elements using flow cytometry.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated urine particle analyzer for in vitro diagnostic screening of patient populations in clinical laboratories, analyzing and flagging specific formed elements in urine.
